contentfulCaseStudy.title: Reducing regression analysis efforts
contentfulCaseStudy.seoDescription: Read the success story about reducing regression analysis efforts, thanks to our test automation results dashboard.

challenges.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Challenges","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Test analysis could only start after full execution was completed (4 hours wasted daily)","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"All test failures had to be analyzed manually","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No visibility into causes for tests failures","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"No tools to manage team workload","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Test execution reports were done manually (1 hour of daily efforts)","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"6wYBgJrlx2BKn3HaCcoRQC","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4Wr2EpDfs2Rj6EeqGGCdrM","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"70gIBoutCQSZKVQMoHvsZ0","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

highlights.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Highlights","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\nIntegration with ReportPortal allowed the client to:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-6"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Real-time analysis during test runs: results available after the first job execution, saving team capacity and providing an early reaction","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Clear visibility into the number of new /existing production defects, auto test related issues, and environment related issues","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Full understanding of application quality, correct planning of maintenance time, and transparent communication of environment instability based on real-time statistics","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"History of tests execution helps to analyze causes of test failures more efficiently","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Improved task management due to possibility to plan work allocation and track tests assigned to each team member","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

benefitsResults.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Benefits & Results","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-4"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"About 20% of defects previously analyzed manually are being updated automatically through Machine Learning capabilities","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Automatic re-run of failed tests provided additional value and saved up to 5.5 of team’s hours per day","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Real-time dashboards were tailored to client’s KPIs, giving full transparency of test execution results","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
